title: Which is the best article rewriter tool for SEO content (non-effective SEO content)? - Quora

response.answer_text: SpinnerChief is a great article rewriter tool. Here are its features.(A free version is available) ● Article Scraper Choose any one of our carefully selected sources and scrape articles based on your keywords,then import them straight in to SpinnerChief. ● Video Scraper This function scrapes videos from Youtube according to your keywords and you can easily insert these videos into your article. ● Picture Scraper This function scrapes pictures from the internet according to your keywords and you can easily insert these pictures into your article. ● Cloud Thesaurus Access over a million synonyms created by our users and use the cloud thesaurus phrase replacement feature to generate human-readable and unique new articles automatically.The number of synonyms in the thesaurus is increasing daily. ● Translation Spin Now you can use translation api like Bing to‘spin’your articles to new articles.And you can customize your translate steps to get best results and this function can also be combined to current SpinnerChief Spin to generate much more readable and unique content automatically. ● Grammar Checker
http://www.spinbot.comArticoolo - create unique content in a flash100% Free SEO Tools - SmallSEOTools.com
